name: Musophobia
description:
Backstory - Musophobia is a game in development by The Catholic Rats, a group formed throughout production for a end of year built final project at AIE (Academy of Interactive Entertainment) based in Melbourne, CBD. 

Synopsis - Hannah Smith, late grand-daughter to Alice Smith has entered her grand-mothers home in order to pack up and sell her missing grand-mother home. Upon entering the 2000s era home, she discovers that things aren't as they should be.

More information and Download link
